name: session-2-backend
description: Today, we focused on **User Authentication** using **Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT, and Bcrypt**. We implemented:   ✅ **User Registration** 📝   ✅ **User Login** 🔑   ✅ **JWT-Based Authentication** 🔐   ✅ **Session Management with Cookies** 🍪   ✅ **EJS Layouts for Views** 🎨
